rows.label: tev000294_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah, my dear friend [ST:playername ].
We were hoping you'd come by today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0002
rows.name:
We just signed a major distribution deal with a food
manufacturer![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0003
rows.name:
Are you surprised? We bet you're wondering which of
our inventions would be of interest to a food company.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0004
rows.name:
Well, let us tell you—it's a low-calorie, highly-addictive,
medicinal salsa![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0005
rows.name:
It's made entirely out of local Miran fruits and
vegetables, including cosse beans, charupa leaves,
and cranjelly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0006
rows.name:
It has virtually no calories, and helps regulate blood
sugar while promoting good intestinal health.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0007
rows.name:
Its flavor profile is so complimentary with processed
meats, it makes hot dogs exponentially more delicious
when applied as a topping.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0008
rows.name:
So delicious, in fact, that test subjects will eat as many
hot dogs as you give them in a single sitting![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0009
rows.name:
Well? Are you impressed?
You know how much we value your opinion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_JNK0010
rows.name: Envy

rows.label: tev000294_SEL0011
rows.name: Express jealousy over how much money L will make.

rows.label: tev000294_JNK0020
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: tev000294_SEL0021
rows.name: Express concern that people will overeat hot dogs.

rows.label: tev000294_JNK0030
rows.name: Advise

rows.label: tev000294_SEL0031
rows.name: Suggest that L develop a pizza sauce for the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0010
rows.name:
This sort of research is far from our specialty, but it
was fun to experiment with the culinary arts and end
up with something so interesting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0011
rows.name:
Even if it only meets our conservative projections,
it should make a considerable amount of money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0012
rows.name:
Which we will then use to invent something that makes
everyone truly happy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0013
rows.name:
Ah, but we mustn't forget your human aphorism—
"pride cometh before the autumn."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0014
rows.name:
It is quite possible that we will end up making only
molehills out of that mountain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0015
rows.name:
We must be careful not to end up failing so
dramatically as an inventor that we end up in debt.
Like a certain someone we could name...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0016
rows.name: After all, this is nothing more than a hobby to us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0017
rows.name: That is quite perceptive of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0018
rows.name:
The salsa itself may be free of calories,
but that isn't true of hot dogs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0019
rows.name:
The addictive properties would all but ensure that our
customers would overeat and grow fat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0020
rows.name:
What a scandal it would be when customers started
growing obese off of a salsa marketed as being low
in calories![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0021
rows.name: But...isn't there another side to this scenario?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0022
rows.name:
What of the hot dog makers who grow insanely
wealthy from our addicted customers?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0023
rows.name:
They would emerge with the greatest profits of all,
stealing the spotted light from us entirely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0024
rows.name:
And when the inevitable class action lawsuit hits,
who do you think will be paying the damages?
A poor salsa maker? Or the mighty hot dog cabal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0025
rows.name:
As you can see, we've studied your culture.
So are you impressed NOW?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0026
rows.name:
The representatives from the food company made the
same request.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0027
rows.name:
They said the Ma-non pizza market is bigger than the
human hot dog market by a factor of 20.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0028
rows.name:
But it's not as if we set out to make a low-calorie,
highly-addictive medicinal salsa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0029
rows.name: It was just a flute! A lucky accident![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0030
rows.name:
So we decided it would be best to take our time and
start by selling the salsa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0031
rows.name:
After all, a journey of a thousand miles begins with a
single successful niche-market product launch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000294_MSG0032
rows.name:
And since you had the same idea, we'd be delighted
to work with you on the pizza-sauce research.[ST:wait ]
